name: The 14th International Conference on Environmental Pollution and Public Health
content: The 14th International Conference on Environmental Pollution and Public Health (EPPH 2024) will be held during November 15-17, 2024 in Sanya, China. This Conference will cover issues on Ecotoxicology and Health Effect, Environmental and Ecological Management, Environmental Biochemistry, Environmental Biotechnology, Environmental Chemistry, Health, and Safety Issues etc. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods in related fields.
